1 out of 5 stars.
MULTIPLE ISSUE TV TURNS OF SUDDENLY
A YEAR AGO
Tv turns of suddenly, wifi is not working properly. within 6months more than 5than tech has visited for issues occurring on TV. Major board on TV is replaced but issue is not resolved am and team is denying replacement and bad support from support line.I am disappointed by the product. I would never recommend and purchase any products from LG.waste of money
